meanings: tired, exhausted, weary, worn out, (formal) fatigued, (S) beat
feel as limp as a rag

vlive.korean: 이제 이게 보이나 봐요 피곤한 게... you can see that. 듣기 View video NCT : 비하인드의 비하인드💚💚
아이~ 피곤한 게 뭐 대수일까요? Is it a huge deal that I'm tired? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST REN] 러브들 오랜만이에요
vlive.english: Is it a huge deal that I'm tired?

vlive.korean: 매우 피곤한 공부 파이팅! Studying must be very tiring but fighting! 듣기 View video GOT7 : 화겸🐥
vlive.english: Studying must be very tiring but fighting!

vlive.korean: 아침잠이 많아서... 그럼 그게 피곤한 건가? Because I have a lot of morning sleep... Is that being tired? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 깜짝왔웅🌸
vlive.english: Because I have a lot of morning sleep... Is that being tired?

vlive.korean: 이게 또 피곤한 거는 사람인지라 어쩔 수 없다... Well, as I'm only a person so I can't help but feel tired. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 오랜만이야 ABNEW🥰
vlive.english: Well, as I'm only a person so I can't help but feel tired.

examples.korean: She suddenly felt old and weary. 발음듣기 그녀는 갑자기 나이가 들고 피곤한 기분이 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She suddenly felt old and weary. 발음

examples.korean: He closed his eyes wearily. 발음듣기 그는 피곤한 듯 눈을 감았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He closed his eyes wearily. 발음

examples.korean: It’s normal to feel tired after such a long trip. 발음듣기 그렇게 긴 여행을 했으니 피곤한 것이 정상이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s normal to feel tired after such a long trip. 발음

examples.korean: ‘The man who is tired of London is tired of life,’ he quoted. 발음듣기 “런던이 피곤한 사람은 삶이 피곤한 사람이다.”라고 그가 인용했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘The man who is tired of London is tired of life,’ he quoted. 발음

examples.korean: I don’t wonder you’re tired. You’ve had a busy day. 발음듣기 당신이 피곤한 것도 당연하죠. 바쁜 하루를 보냈잖아요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t wonder you’re tired. You’ve had a busy day. 발음
